{"id":918212012,"question_id":6,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"1 year, 3 months","timestamp":1679242536,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"46 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/918212012/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zigzag Conversion","memory":"14 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def convert(self, s: str, numRows: int) -> str:\n        if numRows == 1:\n            return s\n\n        rows = [''] * numRows\n        curr_row = 0\n        direction = -1\n\n        for char in s:\n            rows[curr_row] += char\n\n            if curr_row == 0 or curr_row == numRows - 1:\n                direction *= -1\n\n            curr_row += direction\n\n        return ''.join(rows)","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
